# <a name="insert-pictures-in-an-email-message-or-calendar-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="4936d-102">電子郵件或行事曆事件中插入圖片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4936d-102">Insert pictures in an email message or calendar event</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4936d-103">您可以從您的電腦或 OneDrive 插入相片、 gif 或美工圖案，做為您的 Outlook.com 電子郵件、 行事曆事件或電子郵件簽章中的內嵌影像。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4936d-103">You can insert photos, gifs, or clipart from your computer or OneDrive as inline images in your Outlook.com email messages, calendar events, or email signature.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="4936d-104">開始撰寫郵件時，或建立行事曆事件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4936d-104">Begin composing a message or creating a calendar event.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="4936d-105">選取 [**插入圖片內嵌**] 圖示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4936d-105">Select the **Insert pictures inline** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="4936d-106">（[**附加**] 圖示旁的 [撰寫] 視窗的底部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4936d-106">at the bottom of the compose window (next to the **Attach** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /><span data-ttu-id="4936d-107">).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4936d-107"></span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="4936d-108">選擇您想要插入並選取 [**開啟**] 的圖片。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4936d-108">Choose the picture you want to insert and select **Open**.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="4936d-109">拖曳角落，以調整影像大小。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4936d-109">Drag the corners to resize the image.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="4936d-110">以滑鼠右鍵按一下圖像可看到的格式設定選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4936d-110">Right-click the image to see formatting options.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4936d-111">讀取的進一步了解如何[附加在 Outlook.com 中的檔案](https://support.office.com/article/8d7c1ea7-4e5f-44ce-bb6e-c5fcc92ba9ab?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4936d-111">Read more about how to [attach files in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8d7c1ea7-4e5f-44ce-bb6e-c5fcc92ba9ab?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
